problem.markdown:
1. What is full form of FBD? (x) Functional block diagram () Flow block diagram () Finite block diagram
2) DCS was evolved from () Electromechanical relay based systems (x) Pneumatic/ Single loop controllers () Programmable logic controllers
3) What is the output of OR block if any one of the input is high or active or true? (x) 1 () 0 () Can't say
4) What is the output of AND block if any one of the input is high or active or true? () 1 (x) 0 () Can't say
5) Production level control is ---level in hierarchical distributed structure () Second () First (x) Third
problem.p: 1. What is full form of FBD?

4) What is the output of AND block if any one of the input is high or active or true?
